duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with the management team in store operations and leading an engaging and inspiring environment for customers and the team.
Drive sales, build awareness of key metrics, and contribute to the development of team members.
Act as a brand ambassador and create an engaging experience that appeals to customers.
Empower the team to drive sales through personalized service, elevated styling, and outfitting recommendations.
Support the store management team in daily office procedures, execution of operations, and store maintenance.
Participate in managing the store environment and customer experience, facilitating an energized pace and driving sales.
Support an inclusive and people-first philosophy, engaging employees at all levels to encourage open dialogue and reinforce follow through.
Take responsibility for own development and professional growth while considering role replacement for career progression.
Adhere to store’s safety standards, inventory accuracy, reduction of product loss, and uphold all company policy and procedures to support the profitability of the store.
Collaborate with key partners to effectively execute shipment processing, restocking, and placement of product while maintaining visual and display standards.
Ensure omni-channel orders are processed timely and accurately and respond to communication from the leadership team.

education_certification.credential: Ability to work flexible hours, including nights, weekends, and holidays
Eagerness to learn and grow within the organization
